description: Germany says 10 European countries will take unaccompanied minors from the fire-ravaged camp in Greece.
title: Moria migrants: European countries agree to take minors after fire
title_page: Moria migrants: European countries agree to take minors after fire - BBC News
maintext: All 400 children have now been flown to the Greek mainland. EU home affairs commissioner Ylva Johansson said on Wednesday that the EU had agreed to finance the transfer of the minors to the mainland and their accommodation. "The safety and shelter of all people in Moria is a priority," she tweeted.
